summary: Dr. Julia E. Olson, M.D., was found guilty of unprofessional conduct, addiction to controlled substances, providing services while under their influence, willful misrepresentation, and illegally prescribing drugs. Her initial suspension was terminated, and she was placed on a minimum three-year probation, conditioned on continued participation in the Maryland Professional Rehabilitation Program (MPRP), with a prior reprimand remaining in effect.
